sections.description:
BCC Signon allows you to connect your website to BCC's Login system : only BCC Members will then be allowed to visit your website

What can this plugin do?

  • Protect a website with OIDC
  • Single SignOn/SignOut with all BCC's websites
  • Enable BCC Topbar in one click
  • Enable private newsfeeds

Technical Support

Feel free to send us any question/report any issue at it@bcc.no.
sections.installation:
Plugin installation

  • Download the plugin here
  • Navigate to Plugins → Add New → Upload Plugin
  • Select the bcc-signon.zip file on your disk
  • Click on Install Now
Activate the BCC Signon plugin from Plugins page.
